appDesc.message: Scrobble your animes on Anilist.co / Kitsu.io

connected.message: Nice ! You are connected ! Nothing to do now.

settings_header.description: Title of the page and first header in Settings

settings_notice.message:
If an anime doesn't have an English name, the Romaji name will be displayed.
An "ignored" website will make the extension inactive on this website.

settings_delete_login.description: Title of the modal and button label

settings_delete_cache_popup_content.message: This cache is here to avoid requesting the name of the anime you're watching anytime, he is destroyed at navigator close but you can force delete here.

settings_delete_login_modal.message: The connection with animelist websites will be terminated and you will need to relogin.

settings_saved.description: Settings status displayed when click on save button

altauth_not_configured.message: You don't configured the alternative authentification

please_login.message: You must login to $SITE$ to use $SITE$ Scrobbler, login with the extension icon at the right top corner.

multiple_entries.message: The $SITE$ database has returned several results, please choose the anime you are watching :

already_watched.message: This episode is already marked as viewed, will do nothing.

scrobbling_in_normal.message: This episode will be automatically added in $DURATION$ minutes (3/4 of the episode).

scrobbling_in_jumped.message: This episode will be automatically added in $DURATION$ minutes (3/4 of the episode, warning : you have missed one or more episodes according to your list).

scrobbling_in_not_in_al.message: This anime is not on your animelist, it will be automatically added in $DURATION$ minutes (3/4 of the episode).

unknown_duration.message: The duration of this episode is unknown, you will have to click on Scrobble now.

scrobbling_not_in_al.message: There is no result for this anime in $SITE$ database, cannot scrobble.

scrobbling_ok.message: Episode has been added to your animelist.

api_error.message: The $SITE$ API returns an error, cannot scrobble your anime.

welcome.message: Welcome to Anilist Srobbler ! Login to Anilist or Kitsu.io with the popup at the top right corner of the browser !
